SELECT ROW_NUMBER()over(order by A.countercode) AS Cno ,A.CounterCode ,case when CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),23 )>=CONVERT(varchar,BP.StartDate,23 ) and CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),23 )< CONVERT(varchar,ISNULL(BP.EndDate,'2100-01-01'),23 ) then '是' else '否' end AS Planstatus, case when CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),23 )<CONVERT(varchar,BP.StartDate,23 ) then '将要启用' when CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),23 )>=CONVERT(varchar,BP.EndDate,23 ) then '已经停用' when CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),23 )>CONVERT(varchar,BP.StartDate,23 ) and BP.EndDate='2100-01-01' then '正在积分' when CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),23 )>CONVERT(varchar,BP.StartDate,23 ) and CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),23 )<CONVERT(varchar,BP.EndDate,23 ) and BP.EndDate<>'2100-01-01' then '将要停用' end AS Explain , BP.StartDate , BP.EndDate, CAST(BP.CurrentPointLimit AS INT) AS CurrentPointLimit, BP.Comment , D.EmployeeName, A.CounterNameIF FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo C WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BIN_BrandInfoID = C.BIN_BrandInfoID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Employee D WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.UpdatedBy = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),D.BIN_EmployeeID) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterPointPlan BP WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BIN_OrganizationID = BP.BIN_OrganizationID
JOIN () A99 ON B.BIN_OrganizationID=A99.BIN_OrganizationID
WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
A.CounterCode like '%'+ #counterCode# +'%'
A.CounterNameIF like '%'+ #counterName# +'%'
BP.CurrentPointLimit >= #pointLimitBegin#
BP.CurrentPointLimit <= #pointLimitEnd#
(( #pointDateBegin# <= BP.StartDate AND #pointDateEnd# > BP.StartDate ) OR ( #pointDateBegin# BETWEEN BP.StartDate AND BP.EndDate ))
( #pointDateBegin# < BP.EndDate )
( #pointDateEnd# > BP.StartDate )
BP.StartDate <= convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) and convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) <= BP.EndDate
(BP.StartDate > convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) or convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) > BP.EndDate or BP.StartDate is null)
A.ValidFlag = #counterStatus#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT A.BIN_CounterInfoID, A.CounterCode, B.StartDate, B.EndDate, B.CurrentPointLimit, B.Comment,
D.EmployeeNameForeign AS employeeName, A.NameForeign AS counterName
D.EmployeeName AS employeeName, A.CounterNameIF AS counterName
D.EmployeeName AS employeeName, A.CounterNameIF AS counterName
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterPointPlan B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Employee D WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.BIN_EmployeeID = D.BIN_EmployeeID WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
A.CounterCode like '%'+ #counterCode# +'%'
A.CounterNameIF like '%'+ #counterName# +'%'
B.CurrentPointLimit >= #pointLimitBegin#
B.CurrentPointLimit <= #pointLimitEnd#
(( #pointDateBegin# <= B.StartDate AND #pointDateEnd# > B.StartDate ) OR ( #pointDateBegin# BETWEEN B.StartDate AND B.EndDate ))
( #pointDateBegin# < B.EndDate )
( #pointDateEnd# > B.StartDate )
B.StartDate <= convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) and convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) <= B.EndDate
(B.StartDate > convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) or convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120) > B.EndDate or B.StartDate is null)
A.ValidFlag = #counterStatus#
